transcription: There were warnings about delivering aid this way. The US and Israel ignored experienced agencies like the United Nations and instead opted for an Israeli-backed organization.
scene: The image features the logo and some text related to the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC). The logo is prominently displayed in the center, with the words "COMITE INTERNATIONAL GENEVE" encircling a red cross symbol. The text to the left and right of the logo appears to be a message or statement, with most of the text being obscured except for a few visible words like "AID SITE ATTACK," "ICRC STATEMENT," and "65%."
